participant_1.background:
I try to keep up with my family by texting them frequently and calling them on the phone.
i drive a big truck.
i am 10 years old.
I love spending time with friends who have kids of their own, because we can relate to each other and enjoy the same activities.
pizza is my favorite.

participant_2.background:
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I have always been close to my parents.
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I've been working at my current job for a year.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do in your free time?
Hey! I like to cook healthy meals for myself, listen to vinyl records, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds nice! I like to cook too, but I don't like cleaning up after.
Me neither! I usually cook in bulk and then freeze the leftovers.
That's a good idea! I might have to try that.
You should! It's a great way to save time and money.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm especially into classic rock and jazz.
Me too! I love listening to old records.
Me too! I have a huge collection of vinyl records.
That's awesome! I only have a few.
Well, you should come over and listen to some of mine sometime.
Great! I'll have to set a date.
